title: Implement role-based access control for generated content and governance settings

sections.text: Add RBAC gates around viewing, generating, editing, and exporting AI-generated content (emails, call notes, next-best-action recommendations) and accessing governance settings in Sales_Accelerator. Define initial roles/permissions aligned to SDR/AE, Manager, and Sales Ops/Admin, with a default-deny posture for new endpoints. Update backend authorization checks and UI affordances so restricted actions/settings are hidden or blocked with clear error messaging.
